name: Shopee dark
css:
/* by Fauzi mas.uziku@gmail.com */
@-moz-document domain("shopee.co.id"), domain("shopee.ph") {
.navbar-wrapper,
.header-with-search-wrapper,
.header,
.header .inner,
.shopee-chat-root .chat-message .offer-bubble,
.shopee-chat-root .chat-message .chat-bubble.to,
.shopee-chat-root .chat-message .image-bubble.to {
	background-color: #292322;
}
.home-category-list__category-grid,
.shopee-recommend-search,
.shopee-sort-by-options,
.footer,
.product-page-seller-info,
.shopee-cart-page-header-wrapper,
.shopee-active-cart,
.shopee-cart-product-header,
.shopee-cart-page-footer,
.account-detail,
.address_holder,
.payment_holder,
.checkout_page .shop-container,
.shipping-option.highlighted,
.checkout_page .shop-container #checkout,
#channel-list .shopee-guarantee-header,
#channel-list,
.coupon-wrapper,
.coupon-wrapper .coupon-status,
.use-coin-wrapper,
.coupon-wrapper .coupon-left-wrapper,
.price-breakdown,
.btn-bottom-holder,
.category-overview-with-banner-wrapper,
.flash-sale-item-card,
.header-with-search-wrapper,
.shopee-product__shipping-option,
.shopee-product-rating-overview,
.notification-page,
.notification-card__button .shopee-button-outline,
.user-page-side-menu,
.shopee-chat-root .chat-message .chat-bubble.from,
.shopee-chat-root .chat-message .image-bubble.from,
.shopee-chat-root .chat-message .image-bubble.to,
.shopee-chat-root .buddy-list,
ul.context-menu-list,
.shopee-chat-root .chat-panel .chat-toolbar {
	background-color: #4c4b4b;
}
.shopee-sort-by-options .shopee-dropdown__entry,
.shopee-image-placeholder,
.shopee-item-card,
.shopee-product-info,
.shopee-product-detail__description,
.product-page .shopee-tab-container,
.shopee-cart-shipping__drawer-content,
.shopee-product-rating-overview__filter,
.product-page__shopee-guarantee,
.shopee-product-sharing,
.shopee-popup__container,
.shopee-product-detail__parameters__content,
.shopee-product-detail__parameters__head,
.navbar-cart-drawer__content,
.navbar-notification-drawer__content,
.notification-list,
.notification-page,
.shopee-chat-root .shopee-chat-container.expanded,
.shopee-chat-root .shopee-chat-container.expanded,
.product-order-card,
.shopee-chat-root .conversation-window,
.shopee-chat__popup-tabs,
body {
	background-color: #6b6b6b;
}
.search-page {
	background-color: #1f1e1e;
}
.home-category-list__category-grid-name,
.trending-search-hotword-wrapper__update-time,
.shopee-header-section--simple .shopee-header-section__header__title,
.shopee-search-filter-status,
.search-page__search-result .shopee-header-section__header__title,
.shopee-condition-filter__header,
.shopee-facet-filter__header,
.shopee-location-filter__header,
.shopee-price-range-filter__header,
.shopee-category-list__main-category__link,
.shopee-category-list__sub-category,
.shopee-condition-filter .shopee-checkbox__control,
.shopee-facet-filter__main-facet__text,
.shopee-location-filter .shopee-checkbox__control,
.shopee-facet-filter__sub-facet__link,
.shopee-sort-by-options__option,
.shopee-sort-by-options .shopee-dropdown__entry,
.shopee-item-card--link,
.shopee-item-card--full .shopee-item-card__label-sold-count,
.product-page .shopee-tab-container,
.product-page-seller-info__item__complement-text,
.product-page-seller-info__buttons .shopee-button-outline,
.product-page-seller-info__active-time,
.product-page-seller-info__name-status,
.product-page-seller-info__header-portrait,
.product-page-seller-info__user-status,
.shopee-product-detail__description,
.shopee-cart-page__main-wrapper,
.shopee-cart-item,
.checkout_page .shop-container .shop .shop-title,
.selected-option-container .selected-option.option-note,
.shipping-option .shipping-option-wrapper .main-content .shipping-option-header,
.checkout_page .shop-container #checkout .checkout-inner .checkout-content .order-word,
.shopee-cart-item-overview__link,
#channel-list .shopee-guarantee-header,
.checkout_page .shop-container #checkout .checkout-inner .checkout-content .checkout-word,
.shopee-button-outline,
.use-coin-wrapper .use-coin__discount.disable,
.use-coin-wrapper .use-coin__discount.off,
.checkout_page .shop-container .item .item-info,
.shopee-product-info-body__ship-to-text,
.shopee-cart-item-overview__name,
.delivery_address,
.account-detail .line-2,
.shopee-product-info-body__shipping-block-label,
.title,
.price-breakdown,
.shopee-footer-section__content,
.account-detail .line-1 div,
.shopee-product-info-body__free-shipping,
.shopee-product-info-body__ship-from-label,
.shopee-product-info-body__order-quantity__stock-count,
.shopee-product-info-body__info-label,
.shopee-product-rating__author-name,
.shopee-product-info-body__ship-to-label,
.product-page-seller-info__item__header,
.shopee-product-info__header__rating-count,
.shopee-product-info__header__sold-count,
.shopee-product-rating__time,
.shopee-product-sharing,
.shopee-page-controller .shopee-button-no-outline,
.shopee-item-card--full .shopee-item-card__btn-comments,
.shopee-item-card--full .shopee-item-card__btn-likes,
.shopee-product-detail__parameters,
.product-page .product-page-breadcrumb__path,
.product-page .product-page-breadcrumb,
.footer__useful-link__link,
.footer__copyright,
.footer__block__content__detail,
.product-page__shopee-guarantee,
.notification-list__text,
.notification-page__activity-header>.shopee-button-no-outline--disabled,
.notification-page__buttons>.shopee-button-no-outline--disabled,
.notification-card--mini .notification-card__content,
.user-page-side-menu__link,
.shopee-product-info__header__no-rating,
.account-detail .line-edit-1 div,
body,
html,
.shopee-chat-root .chat-message .timestamp,
.shopee-chat-root .popover-button {
	color: #fff;
}
.shopee-badge--promotion__label-wrapper__off-label {
	color: #2f1b1b;
}
.shopee-footer-section__content a {
	color: rgb(255, 87, 34);
}
.shopee-item-card__current-price,
.shopee-cart-shipping__learn-more,
.shopee-cart-item__cell-total-price,
.shopee-cart-page-footer-summary__subtotal-amount {
	color: #ffd801;
	font-weight: bold;
}
.hashtag-card__label {
	background-color: rgba(6, 6, 6, 0.78);
}
.shopee-searchbar-input__input,
.shopee-chat-root .popup-parent>.shopee-chat-popover,
.shopee-chat-root .chat-panel textarea {
	color: #000;
}
.product-page-seller-info__buttons .shopee-button-outline,
.shopee-chat__popup-tabs>li.active {
	border-color: #fff;
}
.product-page-seller-info__item__separator {
	background-color: #fff;
}
.shopee-product-sharing,
.shopee-button-outline {
	border: 1px solid #ffedb3;
	box-shadow: none;
}
.user-page-side-menu__link {
	border-left: none;
}
.context-menu-hover {
	background-color: #4c4b4b!Important;
}
}
